com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources

Class ThumbPhotoDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources.ThumbPhotoDataSource

  • public class ThumbPhotoDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    API that provide 3 asynchronous methods: (important note : every method work in synchronize way so the call order is saved, you will get the the thumb order as the call method order). 1 - getToplistPhotos that receive num page and listener as a parameters and then get the 24 thump photos with there details form toplist category from specified page and then call one of the listener methods (onResult, onError, depends the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread. So the main thread can fill the recycle view with toplist thumb photos in appropriate fragment. 2 - getLatestPhotos that receive num page and listener as a parameters and then get the 24 thump photos with there details form Latest category from specified page and then call one of the listener methods (onResult, onError, depends the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread. So the main thread can fill the recycle view with Latest thumb photos in appropriate fragment. 3 - getRandomPhotos that receive num page and listener as a parameters and then get the 24 thump photos with there details form Latest category from specified page and then call one of the listener methods (onResult, onError, depends the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread. So the main thread can fill the recycle view with random thumb photos in appropriate fragment.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener
      To use getToplistPhotos, getLatestPhotos, getRandomPhotos, you must send a listener as a parameter so we can notify you with the results.

    • Method Detail

      • getThumbPhotosSync

        private static java.util.List<ThumbPhoto> getThumbPhotosSync(int pageNum,
                                                             home homePage)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Method that connect to the internet link addresss and get the info from the HTML file and parse it to create a list of ThumbPhoto objects, and return it. This method work in sync way, we call her in a number of background threads.
        Parameters:
        pageNum - is page number that you want to extract the thumb photos from her.
        homePage - is the category that you want to extract the photos from her, we have 3 category (Latest, TopList, Random) in home enum.
        Returns:
        a list (ArrayList) of thumb photos that contain the info of the thumb photos.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it's fail to connect to the internet.

      • getPhotos

        private static void getPhotos(int pageNum,
                              home homePage,
                              ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener listener,
                              @NonNull
                              java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService)
        Helping method to reuse code : Method that receive pageNum, listener, homePage, executorService as a parameters and then get the 24 thump photos. With there details form homePage category (it could be Latest, TopList or Random) from the specified pageNum, and run the task on the executorService (single thread), we must send the appropriate single thread. After the task done (or fail) we call one of the listener methods. (onResult, onError, depends the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread.
        Parameters:
        pageNum - is page number homePage photos category that you want to extract the thumb photos from it.
        listener - is a listener that implement OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener Interface to notify him when the the result is ready in : ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener.onResult(List) method. or an error accrued dairying the process in: ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener.onError(Exception) method. Notice those methods (onResult,onError) runs on the caller thread.
        homePage - is the category that we want to extract the thumb photos from it, (it could be Latest, TopList or Random).
        executorService - We have 3 final single threads, to optimize the GC, because we use them all the time. So executorService is the appropriate thread to accomplish the task. if you want to get thump photos from : Latest -> you must send serviceLatest thread ExecutorService TopList -> you must send serviceTopList thread ExecutorService Random -> you must send serviceRandom thread ExecutorService. In other words the executorService is the thread ExecutorService that must do the work in async way, and when done/fail will call one of the listener methods.

      • getLatestPhotos

        public static void getLatestPhotos(int pageNum,
                                   ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener listener)
        Async method that receive num page and listener as a parameters and then get the 24 thump photos with there details form Latest category from specified page and then call one of the listener methods. (onResult, onError, depends the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread.
        Parameters:
        pageNum - is page number of latest photos category that you want to extract the thumb photos from it.
        listener - is a listener that implement OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener Interface to notify him when the the result is ready in : ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener.onResult(List) method. or an error accrued dairying the process in: ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener.onError(Exception) method. Notice those methods (onResult,onError) runs on the caller thread.

Notice those methods (onResult,onError) runs on the caller thread.

      • getSearchedThumbPhotosSync

        private static java.util.List<ThumbPhoto> getSearchedThumbPhotosSync(int pageNum,
                                                                     java.lang.String searchedWord)
                                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Method that connect to the internet link addresss that contain the searched word in it as a url, and get the info from the HTML file and parse it to create a list of ThumbPhoto objects, and return it. This method work in sync way, we call her in background thread.
        Parameters:
        pageNum - is page number that you want to extract the searched thumb photos from her.
        searchedWord - is the phrase you want to search or the searched word.
        Returns:
        a list (ArrayList) of thumb photos of the searched photos that contain the info of the thumb photos.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it's fail to connect to the internet.

      • getSearchedPhotos

        public static void getSearchedPhotos(int pageNum,
                                     java.lang.String searchedWord,
                                     ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener listener)
        Method that receive pageNum, searched phrase (word) and listener as a parameters and then get the 24 thump photos of the searched photos from the specified pageNum. And run the task on the serviceSearch (single thread). After the task done (or fail) we call one of the listener methods. (onResult, onError, depends the situation) and run it on the caller thread - main thread.
        Parameters:
        pageNum - is page number of the searched photos that you want to extract the thumb photos of the searched photos from it.
        searchedWord - is the phrase/word that the user enter to search photos, to show him related photos of his search.
        listener - is a listener that implement OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener Interface to notify him when the the result is ready in : ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener.onResult(List) method. or an error accrued dairying the process in: ThumbPhotoDataSource.OnThumbPhotoArrivedListener.onError(Exception) method. Notice those methods (onResult,onError) runs on the caller thread.
